title: unknown error upon login, can't connect to chat
body: I'm having trouble connecting to chat on the client -- I keep getting "An unknown error has occurred" and restarting the client and the computer don't work. I'm currently on macOS Sierra. Thanks!

replies.body: Thanks for all the insight on this!  There were some server issues over the night that should be resolved now.  Be sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates on issues like this.  Thanks for the post!

If you guys want to play with friends all you need to do is in the game hub when in game set up invite them using the type feature letting you type in their name so you can play with them.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Same. And I can open the store but can't do any purchase.
Is there an approximate time estimate until this is going to be fixed. I really want to play with my friends.{{item:3070}}
Same, but i can't even get into hextech crafting now wtf?
Look like there's a lot of people having this issue..... same for me
Why aren't they saying anything about this matter....it's literally several people including myself...i can't connect to chat
